main.hero.title: Savor Authentic Filipino Flavors
main.hero.paragraph: From sizzling sisig to soulful sinigang — every dish is a celebration.
main.bibleverse.paragraph: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the LORD, plans to prosper you and not harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
main.menu.item.card.title: Pancit with Fried Chicken and Pork BBQ Skewer
main.menu.item.card.text1: Stir-fried noodles loaded with vegetables, topped with crispy golden fried chicken, and paired with a smoky pork BBQ skewer glazed in sweet-savory sauce. A comforting classic that brings the party to your table.
main.menu.item.card.text2: Tender slices of marinated beef tapa, pan-fried to savory perfection, paired with fragrant garlic fried rice and a sunny-side-up egg. Served with a side of vinegar dip for that classic tangy kick.
main.menu.item.card.text3: Golden-fried pork belly with crackling skin and juicy, flavorful meat inside. Each bite delivers a satisfying crunch, balanced by our signature liver sauce and a side of pickled papaya for a burst of brightness.
main.menu.quote.paragraph: At the heart of our menu is a deep love for Filipino home cooking. Each dish is inspired by the meals we grew up with — rich in flavor, cooked with care, and meant to be shared. We focus on serving honest, satisfying food that brings people together and is made to last.
home.title: Morena Restaurant
about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: A journey of passion, flavor, and community
about.our.beginning.title: Our Beginning
about.our.beginning.text: At Morena Restaurant, our journey began with a simple dream: to create a better life and share it through good food. What started as a desire for a greener pasture quickly turned into a heartfelt mission — to serve fresh, affordable meals that bring families and communities together.
about.our.mission.title: Our Mission
about.our.mission.text: We believe the true reward in this business isn't just success — it's seeing happy customers return, often bringing new faces with them. That's the kind of satisfaction that keeps us going every day.
about.our.mission.text2: Our concept is straightforward but meaningful: offer delicious food made with quality ingredients at prices that don't break the bank. We're here to fill your tummy and feed your soul.
about.our.values.title: Our Values
about.our.values.subtitle: What drives us every day
about.quality.standards.title: Quality Standards
about.quality.standards.text: We take food quality seriously, adhering strictly to the standards and guidelines set by the Province of Quebec and the City of Montreal. Cleanliness, freshness, and consistency are the pillars of every dish we serve.
about.customer.feedback.title: Customer Feedback
about.customer.feedback.text: Customer feedback is a gift. Whether it's praise or criticism, we listen with humility and use it to improve. Your experience matters to us, and we're always striving to do better.
about.communication.connection.title: Community Connection
about.communication.connection.text: While we try different ways to spread the word, nothing beats a heartfelt recommendation. Word of mouth remains our most powerful marketing tool — and we're grateful every time you share our name with someone you care about.
about.closing.message.title: Thank You
about.closing.message.text: ... for being a part of our story. We look forward to welcoming you — again and again.
contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Feel free to reach out to us anytime!
contact.address.title: Address
contact.phone.title: Phone
contact.email.phone.title: Email
menu.combo.title: Combo Meals
menu.combo.m.img.desc: Enjoy a comforting plate of sweet-style Filipino spaghetti paired with two crispy, golden fried chicken pieces for a hearty and nostalgic meal.
menu.combo.o.img.desc: Savor the rich, savory flavors of palabok noodles topped with garlic and chicharrón, complemented perfectly by a tender, smoky pork BBQ skewer.
menu.combo.r.img.desc: A flavorful combo of stir-fried pancit noodles served with a crispy fried chicken piece and a succulent pork BBQ skewer for the ultimate trio of Filipino favorites.
menu.combo.e.img.desc: This satisfying dish features fluffy white rice served with a crunchy fried chicken piece and a lightly breaded, golden fish fillet for a tasty land-and-sea combo.
menu.combo.n.img.desc: Packed with flavor, this hearty meal comes with two crispy fried chicken pieces and a smoky pork BBQ skewer, all served over a bed of rice.
menu.combo.a.img.desc: A delightful pairing of tender chicken BBQ and crispy fish fillet served over steamed rice, offering a balance of smoky, savory, and crispy textures.
menu.combo.h.img.desc: Perfectly grilled pork and chicken BBQ skewers served over rice for a smoky, savory combo that's big on flavor and satisfying to the last bite.
menu.combo.j.img.desc: Simple yet delicious, this meal features juicy, marinated chicken BBQ served over a bed of warm, fluffy rice for a classic and comforting option.
